Interface IEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISerializable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Entity

    public interface IEntity
extends ISerializable
    Interface for an entity.
    Author:
    Rhondu Smithwick, Tom Wu
